review: It was all that it was described to be. I have used it everyday since I have had it. I plan on buying additional ones for other TV's at home.

review: Love the Amazon Fire Stick, my family watches Netflix and Hulu Plus, our old receiver was slow and outdated, the Fire Stick is quick and allows us to enjoy all the new features we were missing. Will recommend it to family and friends.
author: P

review: ive dealt with roku,apple tv,ive dealt with many tech devices.the firestick is an absolute must have device.i feel guilty paying only 40 bucks.i may buy one for every tv in the house.trust me, you have to buy one .
author: jonathan bridgman
